Vietnam: The Siege of Quy Nhơn took place.
Malta: The French surrender. General Vaubois surrendered and with Rear Admiral Villeneuve, Major General Pigot and Captain Martin, signed the articles of Capitulation. Although 20,000 Maltese lost their lives during the uprising, not one Maltese was present to sign the document. Malta and Gozo become a Protectorate.
Indonesia: The bankrupt Dutch East India Company (VOC) is formally dissolved and the nationalised Dutch East Indies is established.
Albania: Most Albanian conversion to Islam came to an end.
